meanings.sent1: After taking a break, she decided to reenroll in the class.
meanings.sent2: I need to reenroll in the gym membership for the new year.
meanings.sent3: He forgot to reenroll in the cooking class and missed out on learning new recipes.
meanings.sent4: The idea to reenroll in the dance lessons danced around in her mind all day.
meanings.sent5: She made a mental note to reenroll in the workshop before the deadline.

meanings.definition: To register again for a course or program.
meanings.sent1: The student had to reenroll in the math course after dropping it last semester.
meanings.sent2: I will reenroll in the online course to complete my certification.
meanings.sent3: Forgetting to reenroll in the art class, she missed the opportunity to showcase her talent.
meanings.sent4: The decision to reenroll in the training program was like hitting the restart button on his career.
meanings.sent5: She felt a sense of relief when she finally decided to reenroll in the language course.
